        Returns:

      • getLowestCommonAncestor

        public static TreeNode getLowestCommonAncestor(java.util.List<TreeNode> nodes)
        Gets the lowest common ancestor (LCA) among the list of TreeNode passed into the function. This lowest common ancestor is the most immediate ancestor node such that the list of tree nodes specified are descendants of the node. This will return null if no such ancestor exists
        Parameters:
        nodes - list of tree nodes to find the LCA
        Returns:
        the first ancestor node that all tree nodes have in common, otherwise null if none exists
